TEXT.TITLE: FRANCE'S CNA ISSUES 120 MLN ECU EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Caisse Nationale des Autoroutes is issuing a 120 mln ecu, 7-3/8 pct bond due May 15, 1995 at 101-3/4 pct, lead manager Credit Lyonnais (CL) said. The non-callable issue of senior debt, guaranteed by France, has fees of 1-1/4 pct for selling and 5/8 pct for management and underwriting including a 1/8 pct praecipuum. "A management group is being put together and we are selling well inside the fees," a CL spokesman said. Payment date is May 15, denominations are of 1,000 and 10,000 ECUs and listing is in Luxembourg. Co-leads are Shearson Lehman and Nippon European Bank SA. REUTER
